analysis.description:
Reentrancy in UpgradeableToken.upgrade (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#493-513):
	External calls:
	- upgradeAgent.upgradeFrom(msg.sender,value) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#505-506)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalUpgraded (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#509-512)

LostAndFoundToken.enableLostAndFound (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#586-601) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_contract.approve(agent,tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#601)

Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1336-1343) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(multisigWallet,unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1342)

Crowdsale.assignTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1263-1266) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(receiver,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1265-1266)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1336-1343):
	External calls:
	- token.releaseTokenTransfer() (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1337-1338)
	- unsoldTokens = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1338-1342)
	- token.transfer(multisigWallet,unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1342)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1343)

Reentrancy in GenericCrowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#891-903):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens.mul(10 ** uint256(token.decimals())) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#895-899)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#903)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#903)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#903)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#903)

GenericCrowdsale.GenericCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#828-834) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < start && start < end) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#832)

GenericCrowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1045-1049) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1046-1049)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1048-1049)

TokenTranchePricing.TokenTranchePricing (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1140-1175) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < start && start < end) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1161-1162)

TokenTranchePricing.getCurrentTranche (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1186-1191) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- tranches[i].start <= block.timestamp && block.timestamp < tranches[i].end && tokensSold < tranches[i].amount (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1188-1190)

elements.expression: tranches[i].start <= block.timestamp && block.timestamp < tranches[i].end && tokensSold < tranches[i].amount

analysis.description:
Crowdsale.setStartingTime (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#1348-1351) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startingTime > block.timestamp && startingTime < endsAt) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol)

Crowdsale.setEndingTime (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(endingTime > block.timestamp && endingTime > startsAt) (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol)

CrowdsaleToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#672-673)
CrowdsaleToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#673)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xddad02f008e310d2fed6546828fc81769fe20978.sol#418-419)
